description: In the opening scene, hot-to-trot newcomer Andreas Montero, just arrived in New York, scans a local gay rag for sex ads. At the gym, he runs into Anthony Ferrat, who turns out to be his neighbor. After Andreas leaves, Ferrat has a wild session in the gyms hot tub with hairy-chested Mitch Ryder. Smooth, lean Ferrat rides Ryder's cock all across the tiles.
title: Anthony Ferrat and Mitch Ryder
